summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Eighth Avenue N.E. from East 45th Street to East 47th Street in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains, constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 15943, creating Local Improvement District No. 1480 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
